question.questionText: Jana and Emily used indophenol to test 3 beverages for vitamin C. The number of drops they added to make a 10 milliliter sample of the blue indophenol indicator become colorless are given here: 8 drops of Overly Orange 13 drops of Luscious Lemon 33 drops of Fruitsnap (and it still didn't change color). Does Overly Orange or Luscious Lemon contain a higher concentration of vitamin C? What is the evidence?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Overly Orange takes fewer drops to change the color of indophenol so Overly Orange has a higher concentration of vitamin C.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: I think Overly Orange juice because it took less drops.
Overly Orange, OO, has more because it has less drops. Luscious Lemon does not have as much as OO because of the drops.
Overly Orange contains higher concentration because the one with the least drops contains most vitamin C. Orange 8, Lemon 13.
Overly Orange contains a higher concentration of vitamin C. The evidence is because if the juice becomes clear with less drops of vitamin C, it means that the vitamin C is strong in that juice.
Overly Orange because orange does contain more color.
Overly Orange because it took fewer drops than Luscious Lemon.
Overly Orange contains more vitamin C because they put less drops of Overly into the container.
No because if it does not go clear it has no vitamin C.
Overly Orange contains a higher concentration of vitamin C, because it took less drops to change the color.
Overly contains a higher amount of vitamin C in it because it took less indophenol to turn the colored juice clear.
Overly Orange because it took the least amount of drops to turn clear.
Overly Orange had the most vitamin C because it does not use the most amount of drops.
Luscious Lemon has a higher concentration of vitamin C because lemons are really sour and Overly Orange was not that sour.
Overly Orange 5 less than the Luscious Lemon and was quicker to change color.
Yes because it had a higher concentration of vitamin C.
Overly Orange contains more vitamin C because it took less drops to change the color of the indophenol.
Yes because vitamin C makes the indicator clear and the lower amount of drops the more vitamin C.

Yes, because if it has lower drops it has more vitamin than others.
